metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to the grotto.2. Harm Shadowheart's parents while she is not there.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Agh... my wound. It burned with pain, then... nothing? Why? Something's wrong.
0.context: NodeContext: Wince of pain at the start, followed by confusion/concern

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: Agh... Lady Shar's mark. I felt it burn, then it just... stopped. Why? Something's wrong.
1.context: NodeContext: Wince of pain at the start, followed by confusion/concern
